title: Blue d'hide chaps (t)

Item ID7384

Blue dragonhide chaps (t) are part of the blue d'hide trimmed set, along with a blue d'hide body (t). Its stats are identical to blue d'hide chaps, but they have a blue trim. To wear blue dragonhide chaps (t), a player must have 50 Ranged.

This item is a reward from hard Treasure Trails. Unlike normal dragonhide armour, this cannot be made with the Crafting skill, nor can trim be added to normal blue dragonhide chaps via any method.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-10+11
 Defence bonuses
+13+16+20+14+20

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 September 2021
(update)

Blue d'hide chaps have received the following changes:

  • Stab Defence bonus decreased from +25 to +13.
  • Slash Defence bonus decreased from +19 to +16.
  • Crush Defence bonus decreased from +27 to +20.
  • Ranged Defence bonus decreased from +25 to +20.
18 June 2015
(update)

Fixed a stretching issue with void robes and dragonhide chaps whilst using Zul-andra teleport.

12 June 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "D'hide chaps (t)" to "Blue d'hide chaps (t)".

7 August -
30 October 2006

The item was renamed from "D-hide chaps(t)" to "D'hide chaps(t)".
